account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the account that owns the recording.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API used when the recording was created.

call_sid.description: The unique identifier of the call associated with the recording.

conference_sid.description: The unique identifier of the conference, if the recording is part of a conference.

date_created.description: The date and time when the recording was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the recording was last updated.

start_time.description: The date and time when the recording started.

duration.description: The duration of the recording in seconds.

sid.description: The unique identifier of the recording.

price.description: The cost of storing the recording.

price_unit.description: The unit in which the cost is measured (e.g., USD).

status.description: The status of the recording (e.g., completed, in-progress).

channels.description: The number of audio channels in the recording.

source.description: The source of the recording (e.g., twilio).

error_code.description: The error code, if any, associated with the recording.

media_url.description: The URL where the recording audio file can be accessed.

uri.description: The URI of the recording resource.

encryption_details.description: Details about the encryption used for the recording.

encryption_public_key_sid.description: The SID of the public key used for encryption.

encryption_cek.description: The Content Encryption Key used for encryption.

iv.description: The Initialization Vector used for encryption.

subresource_uris.description: URIs for subresources related to the recording.

transcriptions.description: The URI to fetch transcriptions of the recording.

add_on_results.description: The URI to fetch add-on results related to the recording.
